anya-e0102n10:2_0: 806. Ito paraṁ gotrabhuñāṇaṁ hoti, taṁ maggassa āvajjanaṭṭhāniyattā neva paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiṁ
anya-e0102n10:2_1: na ñāṇadassanavisuddhiṁ bhajati, antarā abbohārikameva hoti. Vipassanāsote patitattā
anya-e0102n10:2_2: pana vipassanāti saṅkhaṁ gacchati. Sotāpattimaggo sakadāgāmimaggo anāgāmimaggo arahattamaggoti
anya-e0102n10:2_3: imesu pana catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṁ ñāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n10:3_0: Tattha paṭhamamaggañāṇaṁ tāva sampādetukāmena aññaṁ kiñci kātabbaṁ nāma natthi. Yañhi
anya-e0102n10:3_1: anena kātabbaṁ siyā, taṁ anulomāvasānaṁ vipassanaṁ uppādentena katameva. Evaṁ uppannaanulomañāṇassa
anya-e0102n10:3_2: panassa tehi tīhipi anulomañāṇehi attano balānurūpena thūlathūle saccapaṭicchādake
anya-e0102n10:3_3: tamamhi antaradhāpite sabbasaṅkhāragatesu cittaṁ na pakkhandati, na santiṭṭhati,
anya-e0102n10:3_4: nādhimuccati, na sajjati, na laggati, na bajjhati. Padumapalāsato udakaṁ viya patilīyati
anya-e0102n10:3_5: patikuṭati pativattati. Sabbaṁ nimittārammaṇampi sabbaṁ pavattārammaṇampi palibodhato
anya-e0102n10:3_6: upaṭṭhāti. Athassa sabbasmiṁ nimittapavattārammaṇe palibodhato upaṭṭhite anulomañāṇassa
anya-e0102n10:3_7: āsevanante animittaṁ appavattaṁ visaṅkhāraṁ nirodhaṁ nibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ kurumānaṁ
anya-e0102n10:3_8: puthujjanagottaṁ puthujjanasaṅkhaṁ puthujjanabhūmiṁ atikkamamānaṁ ariyagottaṁ ariyasaṅkhaṁ
anya-e0102n10:3_11: sādhayamānaṁ sikhāppattaṁ vipassanāya muddhabhūtaṁ apunarāvaṭṭakaṁ uppajjati gotrabhuñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:5_0: “Kathaṁ bahiddhā vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā gotrabhuñāṇaṁ? Uppādaṁ abhibhuyyatīti gotrabhu.
anya-e0102n10:5_1: Pavattaṁ…pe… upāyāsaṁ abhibhuyyatīti gotrabhu. Bahiddhā saṅkhāranimittaṁ abhibhuyyatīti
anya-e0102n10:5_2: gotrabhu. Anuppādaṁ pakkhandatīti gotrabhu. Appavattaṁ…pe… anupāyāsaṁ nirodhaṁ nibbānaṁ
anya-e0102n10:5_3: pakkhandatīti gotrabhu. Uppādaṁ abhibhuyyitvā anuppādaṁ pakkhandatīti gotrabhū”ti
anya-e0102n10:6_0: 807. Tatrāyaṁ ekāvajjanena ekavīthiyaṁ pavattamānānampi anulomagotrabhūnaṁ nānārammaṇe
anya-e0102n10:6_1: pavattanākāradīpikā upamā – yathā hi mahāmātikaṁ laṅghitvā paratīre patiṭṭhātukāmo
anya-e0102n10:6_2: puriso vegena dhāvitvā mātikāya orimatīre rukkhasākhāya bandhitvā olambitaṁ rajjuṁ
anya-e0102n10:6_3: vā yaṭṭhiṁ vā gahetvā ullaṅghitvā paratīraninnapoṇapabbhārakāyo hutvā paratīrassa
anya-e0102n10:6_4: uparibhāgaṁ patto taṁ muñcitvā vedhamāno paratīre patitvā saṇikaṁ patiṭṭhāti, evamevāyaṁ
anya-e0102n10:6_5: yogāvacaropi bhavayonigatiṭṭhitinivāsānaṁ paratīrabhūte nibbāne patiṭṭhātukāmo udayabbayānupassanādinā
anya-e0102n10:6_6: vegena dhāvitvā attabhāvarukkhasākhāya bandhitvā olambitaṁ rūparajjuṁ vā vedanādīsu
anya-e0102n10:6_7: aññataradaṇḍaṁ vā aniccanti vā dukkhanti vā anattāti vāti anulomāvajjanena gahetvā
anya-e0102n10:6_8: taṁ amuñcamānova paṭhamena anulomacittena ullaṅghitvā dutiyena paratīraninnapoṇapabbhārakāyo
anya-e0102n10:6_9: viya nibbānaninnapoṇapabbhāramānaso hutvā tatiyena paratīrassa uparibhāgaṁ patto
anya-e0102n10:6_10: viya idāni pattabbassa nibbānassa āsanno hutvā tassa cittassa nirodhena taṁ saṅkhārārammaṇaṁ
anya-e0102n10:6_11: muñcitvā gotrabhucittena visaṅkhāre paratīrabhūte nibbāne patati. Ekārammaṇe pana
anya-e0102n10:6_12: aladdhāsevanatāya vedhamāno so puriso viya na tāva suppatiṭṭhito hoti, tato maggañāṇena patiṭṭhātīti.
anya-e0102n10:7_0: 808. Tattha anulomaṁ saccapaṭicchādakaṁ kilesatamaṁ vinodetuṁ sakkoti, na nibbānamārammaṇaṁ
anya-e0102n10:7_1: kātuṁ. Gotrabhu nibbānameva ārammaṇaṁ kātuṁ sakkoti, na saccapaṭicchādakaṁ tamaṁ
anya-e0102n10:7_2: vinodetuṁ. Tatrāyaṁ upamā – eko kira cakkhumā puriso “nakkhattayogaṁ jānissāmī”ti
anya-e0102n10:7_3: rattibhāge nikkhamitvā candaṁ passituṁ uddhaṁ ullokesi, tassa valāhakehi paṭicchannattā
anya-e0102n10:7_4: cando na paññāyittha. Atheko vāto uṭṭhahitvā thūlathūle valāhake viddhaṁseti. Aparo
anya-e0102n10:7_5: majjhime, aparo sukhumeti. Tato so puriso vigatavalāhake nabhe candaṁ disvā nakkhattayogaṁ aññāsi.
anya-e0102n10:8_0: Tattha tayo valāhakā viya saccapaṭicchādakathūlamajjhimasukhumaṁ kilesandhakāraṁ,
anya-e0102n10:8_1: tayo vātā viya tīṇi anulomacittāni, cakkhumā puriso viya gotrabhuñāṇaṁ, cando viya
anya-e0102n10:8_2: nibbānaṁ, ekekassa vātassa yathākkamena valāhakaviddhaṁsanaṁ viya ekekassa anulomacittassa
anya-e0102n10:8_3: saccapaṭicchādakatamavinodanaṁ, vigatavalāhake nabhe tassa purisassa visuddhacandadassanaṁ
anya-e0102n10:8_4: viya vigate saccapaṭicchādake tame gotrabhuñāṇassa visuddhanibbānadassanaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:9_0: Yatheva hi tayo vātā candapaṭicchādake valāhakeyeva viddhaṁsetuṁ sakkonti, na candaṁ
anya-e0102n10:9_1: daṭṭhuṁ, evaṁ anulomāni saccapaṭicchādakaṁ tamaññeva vinodetuṁ sakkonti, na nibbānaṁ
anya-e0102n10:9_2: daṭṭhuṁ. Yathā so puriso candameva daṭṭhuṁ sakkoti, na valāhake viddhaṁsetuṁ, evaṁ
anya-e0102n10:9_3: gotrabhuñāṇaṁ nibbānameva daṭṭhuṁ sakkoti, na kilesatamaṁ vinodetuṁ. Teneva cetaṁ
anya-e0102n10:9_4: maggassa āvajjananti vuccati. Tañhi anāvajjanampi samānaṁ āvajjanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā “evaṁ
anya-e0102n10:9_5: nibbattāhī”ti maggassa saññaṁ datvā viya nirujjhati. Maggopi tena dinnasaññaṁ amuñcitvāva
anya-e0102n10:9_6: avīcisantativasena taṁ ñāṇaṁ anuppabandhamāno anibbiddhapubbaṁ apadālitapubbaṁ lobhakkhandhaṁ
anya-e0102n10:10_0: 809. Tatrāyaṁ upamā – eko kira issāso aṭṭhausabhamatte padese phalakasataṁ ṭhapāpetvā
anya-e0102n10:10_1: vatthena mukhaṁ veṭhetvā saraṁ sannahitvā cakkayante aṭṭhāsi. Añño puriso cakkayantaṁ
anya-e0102n10:10_2: āvijjhitvā yadā issāsassa phalakaṁ abhimukhaṁ hoti, tadā tattha daṇḍakena saññaṁ
anya-e0102n10:10_3: deti. Issāso daṇḍakasaññaṁ amuñcitvāva saraṁ khipitvā phalakasataṁ nibbijjhati. Tattha
anya-e0102n10:10_4: daṇḍakasaññaṁ viya gotrabhuñāṇaṁ, issāso viya maggañāṇaṁ. Issāsassa daṇḍakasaññaṁ
anya-e0102n10:10_5: amuñcitvāva phalakasatanibbijjhanaṁ viya maggañāṇassa gotrabhuñāṇena dinnasaññaṁ
anya-e0102n10:10_6: amuñcitvāva nibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā anibbiddhapubbānaṁ apadālitapubbānaṁ lobhadosamohakkhandhānaṁ
anya-e0102n10:11_0: 810. Na kevalañcesa maggo lobhakkhandhādīnaṁ nibbijjhanameva karoti, apica kho anamataggasaṁsāravaṭṭadukkhasamuddaṁ
anya-e0102n10:11_1: soseti, sabbaapāyadvārāni pidahati, sattannaṁ ariyadhanānaṁ sammukhībhāvaṁ karoti,
anya-e0102n10:11_2: aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ micchāmaggaṁ pajahati, sabbaverabhayāni vūpasameti, sammāsambuddhassa
anya-e0102n10:11_3: orasaputtabhāvaṁ upaneti, aññesañca anekasatānaṁ ānisaṁsānaṁ paṭilābhāya saṁvattatīti
anya-e0102n10:11_4: evaṁ anekānisaṁsadāyakena sotāpattimaggena sampayuttaṁ ñāṇaṁ sotāpattimagge ñāṇanti.
anya-e0102n10:14_0: 811. Imassa pana ñāṇassa anantaraṁ tasseva vipākabhūtāni dve tīṇi vā phalacittāni
anya-e0102n10:14_2: ca “dandhaṁ ānantarikaṁ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṁ khayāyā”ti ca ādi vuttaṁ. Keci pana ekaṁ
anya-e0102n10:14_3: dve tīṇi cattāri vā phalacittānīti vadanti, taṁ na gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:15_0: Anulomassa hi āsevanante gotrabhuñāṇaṁ uppajjati. Tasmā sabbantimena paricchedena
anya-e0102n10:15_1: dvīhi anulomacittehi bhavitabbaṁ. Na hi ekaṁ āsevanapaccayaṁ labhati, sattacittaparamā
anya-e0102n10:15_2: ca ekāvajjanavīthi. Tasmā yassa dve anulomāni, tassa tatiyaṁ gotrabhu catutthaṁ maggacittaṁ
anya-e0102n10:15_3: tīṇi phalacittāni honti. Yassa tīṇi anulomāni, tassa catutthaṁ gotrabhu pañcamaṁ
anya-e0102n10:15_4: maggacittaṁ dve phalacittāni honti. Tena vuttaṁ “dve tīṇi vā phalacittāni uppajjantī”ti.
anya-e0102n10:16_0: Keci pana yassa cattāri anulomāni, tassa pañcamaṁ gotrabhu chaṭṭhaṁ maggacittaṁ ekaṁ
anya-e0102n10:16_1: phalacittanti vadanti, taṁ pana yasmā catutthaṁ pañcamaṁ vā appeti, na tato paraṁ
anya-e0102n10:16_2: āsannabhavaṅgattāti paṭikkhittaṁ. Tasmā na sārato paccetabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:17_0: 812. Ettāvatā ca panesa sotāpanno nāma dutiyo ariyapuggalo hoti. Bhusaṁ pamattopi
anya-e0102n10:17_1: hutvā sattakkhattuṁ devesu ca manussesu ca sandhāvitvā saṁsaritvā dukkhassantassa
anya-e0102n10:17_2: karaṇasamattho hoti. Phalapariyosāne panassa cittaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ otarati, tato bhavaṅgaṁ
anya-e0102n10:17_3: upacchinditvā maggapaccavekkhaṇatthāya uppajjati manodvārāvajjanaṁ, tasmiṁ niruddhe
anya-e0102n10:17_4: paṭipāṭiyā satta maggapaccavekkhaṇajavanānīti. Puna bhavaṅgaṁ otaritvā teneva nayena
anya-e0102n10:17_5: phalādīnaṁ paccavekkhaṇatthāya āvajjanādīni uppajjanti. Yesaṁ uppattiyā esa maggaṁ
anya-e0102n10:17_6: paccavekkhati, phalaṁ paccavekkhati, pahīnakilese paccavekkhati, avasiṭṭhakilese
anya-e0102n10:18_0: So hi “iminā vatāhaṁ maggena āgato”ti maggaṁ paccavekkhati, tato “ayaṁ me ānisaṁso
anya-e0102n10:18_1: laddho”ti phalaṁ paccavekkhati. Tato “ime nāma me kilesā pahīnā”ti pahīnakilese paccavekkhati.
anya-e0102n10:18_2: Tato “ime nāma me kilesā avasiṭṭhā”ti uparimaggattayavajjhe kilese paccavekkhati.
anya-e0102n10:18_3: Avasāne ca “ayaṁ me dhammo ārammaṇato paṭividdho”ti amataṁ nibbānaṁ paccavekkhati.
anya-e0102n10:18_4: Iti sotāpannassa ariyasāvakassa pañca paccavekkhaṇāni honti. Yathā ca sotāpannassa,
anya-e0102n10:18_5: evaṁ sakadāgāmianāgāmīnampi. Arahato pana avasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇaṁ nāma natthīti.
anya-e0102n10:19_1: vā na vā. Tassa hi paccavekkhaṇassa abhāveneva mahānāmo bhagavantaṁ pucchi “kosu
anya-e0102n10:19_2: nāma me dhammo ajjhattaṁ appahīno, yena me ekadā lobhadhammāpi cittaṁ pariyādāya
anya-e0102n10:21_0: 813. Evaṁ paccavekkhitvā pana so sotāpanno ariyasāvako tasmiññeva vā āsane nisinno,
anya-e0102n10:21_1: aparena vā samayena kāmarāgabyāpādānaṁ tanubhāvāya dutiyāya bhūmiyā pattiyā yogaṁ
anya-e0102n10:21_2: karoti. So indriyabalabojjhaṅgāni samodhānetvā tadeva rūpavedanāsaññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇabhedaṁ
anya-e0102n10:21_3: saṅkhāragataṁ aniccaṁ dukkhamanattāti ñāṇena parimaddati, parivatteti, vipassanāvīthiṁ
anya-e0102n10:21_4: ogāhati. Tassevaṁ paṭipannassa vuttanayeneva saṅkhārupekkhāvasāne ekāvajjanena anulomagotrabhuñāṇesu
anya-e0102n10:21_5: uppannesu gotrabhuanantaraṁ sakadāgāmimaggo uppajjati. Tena sampayuttaṁ ñāṇaṁ sakadāgāmimagge ñāṇanti.
anya-e0102n10:24_0: 814. Imassāpi ñāṇassa anantaraṁ vuttanayeneva phalacittāni veditabbāni. Ettāvatā
anya-e0102n10:24_1: cesa sakadāgāmī nāma catuttho ariyapuggalo hoti sakiṁdeva imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvā dukkhassantakaraṇasamattho.
anya-e0102n10:25_0: Evaṁ paccavekkhitvā ca so sakadāgāmī ariyasāvako tasmiññeva vā āsane nisinno aparena
anya-e0102n10:25_1: vā samayena kāmarāgabyāpādānaṁ anavasesappahānāya tatiyāya bhūmiyā pattiyā yogaṁ
anya-e0102n10:25_2: karoti, so indriyabalabojjhaṅgāni samodhānetvā tadeva saṅkhāragataṁ aniccaṁ dukkhamanattāti
anya-e0102n10:25_3: ñāṇena parimaddati, parivatteti, vipassanāvīthiṁ ogāhati. Tassevaṁ paṭipannassa vuttanayeneva
anya-e0102n10:25_5: anāgāmimaggo uppajjati, tena sampayuttaṁ ñāṇaṁ anāgāmimagge ñāṇanti.
anya-e0102n10:28_0: 815. Imassapi ñāṇassa anantaraṁ vuttanayeneva phalacittāni veditabbāni. Ettāvatā
anya-e0102n10:28_1: cesa anāgāmī nāma chaṭṭho ariyapuggalo hoti opapātiko tatthaparinibbāyī anāvattidhammo
anya-e0102n10:28_2: paṭisandhivasena imaṁ lokaṁ puna anāgantā. Tato paraṁ paccavekkhaṇaṁ vuttanayameva.
anya-e0102n10:29_0: Evaṁ paccavekkhitvā ca so anāgāmī ariyasāvako tasmiññeva vā āsane nisinno, aparena
anya-e0102n10:29_1: vā samayena rūpārūparāgamānauddhaccaavijjānaṁ anavasesappahānāya catutthāya bhūmiyā
anya-e0102n10:29_2: pattiyā yogaṁ karoti, so indriyabalabojjhaṅgāni samodhānetvā tadeva saṅkhāragataṁ
anya-e0102n10:29_3: aniccaṁ dukkhamanattāti ñāṇena parimaddati, parivatteti, vipassanāvīthiṁ ogāhati.
anya-e0102n10:29_4: Tassevaṁ paṭipannassa vuttanayeneva saṅkhārupekkhāvasāne ekāvajjanena anulomagotrabhuñāṇesu
anya-e0102n10:29_5: uppannesu gotrabhuanantaraṁ arahattamaggo uppajjati, tena sampayuttaṁ ñāṇaṁ arahattamagge ñāṇanti.
anya-e0102n10:32_0: 816. Imassapi ñāṇassa anantaraṁ vuttanayeneva phalacittāni veditabbāni. Ettāvatā
anya-e0102n10:32_1: cesa arahā nāma aṭṭhamo ariyapuggalo hoti mahākhīṇāsavo antimadehadhārī ohitabhāro
anya-e0102n10:32_2: anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammādaññā vimutto sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhiṇeyyoti.
anya-e0102n10:33_0: Iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ “sotāpattimaggo sakadāgāmimaggo anāgāmimaggo arahattamaggoti imesu
anya-e0102n10:33_1: pana catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṁ ñāṇadassanavisuddhi nāmā”ti, taṁ imāni iminā anukkamena
anya-e0102n10:37: Ye yena pahātabbā, dhammā tesaṁ pahānañca.
anya-e0102n10:40_0: 818. Tattha paripuṇṇabodhipakkhiya, bhāvoti bodhipakkhiyānaṁ paripuṇṇabhāvo. Cattāro
anya-e0102n10:40_1: satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni,
anya-e0102n10:40_2: satta bojjhaṅgā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti hi ime sattatiṁsa dhammā bujjhanaṭṭhena
anya-e0102n10:40_3: bodhoti laddhanāmassa ariyamaggassa pakkhe bhavattā bodhipakkhiyā nāma. Pakkhe bhavattāti
anya-e0102n10:41_0: 819. Tesu tesu ārammaṇesu okkhanditvā pakkhanditvā upaṭṭhānato paṭṭhānaṁ. Satiyeva
anya-e0102n10:42_0: 820. Padahanti etenāti padhānaṁ. Sobhanaṁ padhānaṁ sammappadhānaṁ. Sammā vā padahanti
anya-e0102n10:42_1: etenāti sammappadhānaṁ. Sobhanaṁ vā taṁ kilesavirūpattavirahato padhānañca hitasukhanipphādakattena
anya-e0102n10:42_2: seṭṭhabhāvāvahanato padhānabhāvakāraṇato cāti sammappadhānaṁ. Vīriyassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:42_3: Tayidaṁ uppannānuppannānaṁ akusalānaṁ pahānānuppattikiccaṁ anuppannuppannānañca kusalānaṁ
anya-e0102n10:42_4: uppattiṭṭhitikiccaṁ sādhayatīti catubbidhaṁ hoti, tasmā cattāro sammappadhānāti vuccanti.
anya-e0102n10:43_0: 821. Pubbe vuttena ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi. Tassā sampayuttāya pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena phalabhūtāya
anya-e0102n10:43_1: pubbabhāgakāraṇaṭṭhena ca iddhiyā pādoti iddhipādo. So chandādivasena catubbidho
anya-e0102n10:43_2: hoti, tasmā cattāro iddhipādāti vuccanti. Yathāha – “cattāro iddhipādā chandiddhipādo
anya-e0102n10:43_3: cittiddhipādo vīriyiddhipādo vīmaṁsiddhipādo”ti. Ime lokuttarāva. Lokiyā pana “chandañce
anya-e0102n10:43_4: bhikkhu adhipatiṁ karitvā labhati samādhiṁ, labhati cittassa ekaggataṁ. Ayaṁ vuccati
anya-e0102n10:44_1: adhipatiyaṭṭhena indriyaṁ. Assaddhiyādīhi ca anabhibhavanīyato akampiyaṭṭhena balaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:44_2: Tadubhayampi saddhādivasena pañcavidhaṁ hoti, tasmā pañcindriyāni pañca balānīti vuccanti.
anya-e0102n10:45_0: 823. Bujjhanakasattassa pana aṅgabhāvena satiādayo satta bojjhaṅgā. Niyyānikaṭṭhena
anya-e0102n10:45_1: ca sammādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha maggaṅgā honti. Tena vuttaṁ “satta bojjhaṅgā ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti.
anya-e0102n10:46_0: 824. Iti ime sattatiṁsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā pubbabhāge lokiyavipassanāya vattamānāya

anya-e0102n10:58_0: 827.Vuṭṭhānabalasamāyogoti vuṭṭhānañceva balasamāyogo ca. Lokiyavipassanā hi nimittārammaṇattā

anya-e0102n10:58_5: vivaṭṭitvā”ti sabbaṁ veditabbaṁ. Imāni pana cattāripi ñāṇāni animittārammaṇattā nimittato

anya-e0102n10:61_2: vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā magge ñāṇaṁ. Abhiniropanaṭṭhena sammāsaṅkappo micchāsaṅkappā…pe…

anya-e0102n10:62: “Sakadāgāmimaggakkhaṇe dassanaṭṭhena sammādiṭṭhi…pe… avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi oḷārikā kāmarāgasaṁyojanā paṭighasaṁyojanā oḷārikā kāmarāgānusayā paṭighānusayā vuṭṭhāti…pe….

anya-e0102n10:77: Agatīti chandadosamohabhayehi akattabbakaraṇassa, kattabbākaraṇassa ca adhivacanaṁ. Tañhi ariyehi agantabbattā agatīti vuccati.

anya-e0102n10:87_0: 830. Iti etesaṁ saṁyojanādīnaṁ dhammānaṁ etāni yathāyogaṁ pahānakarāni. Kathaṁ? Saṁyojanesu
anya-e0102n10:87_1: tāva sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāso apāyagamanīyā ca kāmarāgapaṭighāti
anya-e0102n10:87_2: ete pañca dhammā paṭhamañāṇavajjhā, sesā kāmarāgapaṭighā oḷārikā dutiyañāṇavajjhā,
anya-e0102n10:87_3: sukhumā tatiyañāṇavajjhā, rūparāgādayo pañcapi catutthañāṇavajjhā eva. Paratopi ca
anya-e0102n10:87_4: yattha yattha evasaddena niyamaṁ na karissāma. Tattha tattha yaṁ yaṁ “upariñāṇavajjho”ti
anya-e0102n10:87_5: vakkhāma, so so purimañāṇehi hatāpāyagamanīyādibhāvova hutvā upariñāṇavajjho hotīti veditabbo.
anya-e0102n10:88: Kilesesu diṭṭhivicikicchā paṭhamañāṇavajjhā, doso tatiyañāṇavajjho, lobhamohamānathinauddhaccaahirikaanottappāni catutthañāṇavajjhāni.
anya-e0102n10:89_0: Micchattesu micchādiṭṭhi musāvādo micchākammanto micchāājīvoti ime paṭhamañāṇavajjhā,
anya-e0102n10:89_1: micchāsaṅkappo pisuṇavācā pharusavācāti ime tatiyañāṇavajjhā, cetanāyeva cettha vācāti
anya-e0102n10:90: Lokadhammesu paṭigho tatiyañāṇavajjho, anunayo catutthañāṇavajjho, yase ca pasaṁsāya ca anunayo catutthañāṇavajjhoti eke. Macchariyāni paṭhamañāṇavajjhāneva.
anya-e0102n10:91_0: Vipallāsesu anicce niccaṁ, anattani attāti ca saññācittadiṭṭhivipallāsā, dukkhe sukhaṁ,

anya-e0102n10:92: Ganthesu sīlabbataparāmasaidaṁsaccābhinivesakāyaganthā paṭhamañāṇavajjhā, byāpādakāyagantho tatiyañāṇavajjho, itaro catutthañāṇavajjho.

anya-e0102n10:97: Upādānesu sabbesampi lokiyadhammānaṁ vatthukāmavasena kāmāti āgatattā rūpārūparāgopi kāmupādāne patati, tasmā taṁ catutthañāṇavajjhaṁ, sesāni paṭhamañāṇavajjhāni.

anya-e0102n10:100_1: paṭhamañāṇavajjhā, pisuṇavācā pharusavācā byāpādoti tayo tatiyañāṇavajjhā, samphappalāpābhijjhā catutthañāṇavajjhā.
anya-e0102n10:101: Akusalacittuppādesu cattāro diṭṭhigatasampayuttā vicikicchāsampayutto cāti pañca paṭhamañāṇavajjhāva, dve paṭighasampayuttā tatiyañāṇavajjhā, sesā catutthañāṇavajjhāti.

anya-e0102n10:103_0: 831. Kiṁ panetāni ete dhamme atītānāgate pajahanti udāhu paccuppanneti. Kiṁ panettha
anya-e0102n10:103_1: yadi tāva atītānāgate, aphalo vāyāmo āpajjati. Kasmā? Pahātabbānaṁ natthitāya. Atha

anya-e0102n10:103_6: “hañci atīte kilese pajahati, tenahi khīṇaṁ khepeti, niruddhaṁ nirodheti, vigataṁ

anya-e0102n10:104_0: Tathā “hañci anāgate kilese pajahati, tenahi ajātaṁ pajahati, anibbattaṁ pajahati,
anya-e0102n10:104_1: anuppannaṁ pajahati, apātubhūtaṁ pajahati. Anāgataṁ yaṁ natthi, taṁ pajahatī”ti ca

anya-e0102n10:105_6: “na hi natthi maggabhāvanā…pe… natthi dhammābhisamayo”ti paṭijānitvā “yathā kathaṁ
anya-e0102n10:106_0: “Seyyathāpi taruṇo rukkho ajātaphalo, tamenaṁ puriso mūle chindeyya, ye tassa rukkhassa

anya-e0102n10:107: 832. Etena kiṁ dīpitaṁ hoti? Bhūmiladdhānaṁ kilesānaṁ pahānaṁ dīpitaṁ hoti. Bhūmiladdhā pana kiṁ atītānāgatā udāhu paccuppannāti. Bhūmiladdhuppannā eva nāma te.

anya-e0102n10:109_0: 834. Ettha ca bhūmiyā bhūmiladdhassa ca nānattaṁ veditabbaṁ. Bhūmīti hi vipassanāya
anya-e0102n10:109_1: ārammaṇabhūtā tebhūmakā pañcakkhandhā. Bhūmiladdhaṁ nāma tesu khandhesu uppattirahaṁ
anya-e0102n10:109_2: kilesajātaṁ. Tenahi sā bhūmi laddhā nāma hotīti tasmā bhūmiladdhanti vuccati, sā
anya-e0102n10:109_3: ca kho na ārammaṇavasena. Ārammaṇavasena hi sabbepi atītānāgate pariññātepi ca khīṇāsavānaṁ
anya-e0102n10:109_4: khandhe ārabbha kilesā uppajjanti mahākaccānauppalavaṇṇādīnaṁ khandhe ārabbha soreyyaseṭṭhi

anya-e0102n10:109_6: koci bhavamūlaṁ pajaheyya. Vatthuvasena pana bhūmiladdhaṁ veditabbaṁ. Yattha yattha
anya-e0102n10:109_7: hi vipassanāya apariññātā khandhā uppajjanti, tattha tattha uppādato pabhuti tesu
anya-e0102n10:109_8: vaṭṭamūlaṁ kilesajātaṁ anuseti. Taṁ appahīnaṭṭhena bhūmiladdhanti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:110_0: 835. Tattha ca yassa yesu khandhesu appahīnaṭṭhena anusayitā kilesā, tassa te eva
anya-e0102n10:110_1: khandhā tesaṁ kilesānaṁ vatthu, na aññesaṁ santakā khandhā. Atītakkhandhesu ca appahīnānusayitānaṁ
anya-e0102n10:110_2: kilesānaṁ atītakkhandhāva vatthu, na itare. Esa nayo anāgatādīsu. Tathā kāmāvacarakkhandhesu
anya-e0102n10:110_3: appahīnānusayitānaṁ kilesānaṁ kāmāvacarakkhandhāva vatthu, na itare. Esa nayo rūpārūpāvacaresu.
anya-e0102n10:110_4: Sotāpannādīsu pana yassa yassa ariyapuggalassa khandhesu taṁ taṁ vaṭṭamūlaṁ kilesajātaṁ
anya-e0102n10:110_5: tena tena maggena pahīnaṁ, tassa tassa te te khandhā pahīnānaṁ tesaṁ tesaṁ vaṭṭamūlakilesānaṁ
anya-e0102n10:110_6: avatthuto bhūmīti saṅkhaṁ na labhanti. Puthujjanassa sabbasova vaṭṭamūlakilesānaṁ
anya-e0102n10:110_7: appahīnattā yaṁkiñci kariyamānaṁ kammaṁ kusalaṁ akusalaṁ vā hoti. Iccassa kammakilesapaccayā
anya-e0102n10:110_8: vaṭṭaṁ vaṭṭati. Tassetaṁ vaṭṭamūlaṁ rūpakkhandheyeva, na vedanākkhandhādīsu. Viññāṇakkhandheyeva
anya-e0102n10:110_9: vā, na rūpakkhandhādīsūti na vattabbaṁ. Kasmā? Avisesena pañcasupi khandhesu anusayitattā.
anya-e0102n10:111_0: 836. Kathaṁ? Pathavīrasādi viya rukkhe. Yathā hi mahārukkhe pathavītalaṁ adhiṭṭhāya
anya-e0102n10:111_2: vaḍḍhitvā nabhaṁ pūretvā yāva kappāvasānā bījaparamparāya rukkhapaveṇiṁ santānayamāne
anya-e0102n10:111_3: ṭhite taṁ pathavīrasādi mūleyeva, na khandhādīsu…pe… phaleyeva vā, na mūlādīsūti
anya-e0102n10:111_4: na vattabbaṁ. Kasmā? Avisesena sabbesu mūlādīsu anugatattāti.
anya-e0102n10:112_0: Yathā pana tasseva rukkhassa pupphaphalādīsu nibbinno koci puriso catūsu disāsu maṇḍūkakaṇṭakaṁ
anya-e0102n10:112_1: nāma visakaṇṭakaṁ ākoṭeyya, atha so rukkho tena visasamphassena phuṭṭho pathavīrasaāporasānaṁ
anya-e0102n10:112_2: pariyādiṇṇattā appasavanadhammataṁ āgamma puna santānaṁ nibbattetuṁ na sakkuṇeyya,
anya-e0102n10:112_3: evameva khandhapavattiyaṁ nibbinno kulaputto tassa purisassa catūsu disāsu rukkhe
anya-e0102n10:112_4: visayojanaṁ viya attano santāne catumaggabhāvanaṁ ārabhati. Athassa so khandhasantāno
anya-e0102n10:112_6: hutvā āyatiṁ punabbhavānabhinibbattanadhammataṁ āgamma bhavantarasantānaṁ nibbattetuṁ
anya-e0102n10:112_7: na sakkoti. Kevalaṁ carimaviññāṇanirodhena nirindhano viya jātavedo anupādāno parinibbāyati,
anya-e0102n10:112_8: evaṁ bhūmiyā bhūmiladdhassa ca nānattaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:113_1: uppannaṁ. Tattha vattamānuppannameva samudācāruppannaṁ. Cakkhādīnaṁ pana āpāthagate
anya-e0102n10:113_2: ārammaṇe pubbabhāge anuppajjamānampi kilesajātaṁ ārammaṇassa adhiggahitattā eva aparabhāge
anya-e0102n10:113_3: ekantena uppattito ārammaṇādhiggahituppannanti vuccati, kalyāṇigāme piṇḍāya carato
anya-e0102n10:113_6: hetuno abhāvā avikkhambhituppannaṁ nāma. Samathavipassanāvasena pana vikkhambhitampi
anya-e0102n10:113_7: ariyamaggena asamūhatattā uppattidhammataṁ anatītatāya asamūhatuppannanti vuccati,
anya-e0102n10:113_8: ākāsena gacchantassa aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino therassa kusumitarukkhe upavane pupphāni

anya-e0102n10:114_3: taṁ uppannabhāvaṁ vināsayamānaṁ yasmā taṁ taṁ lokiyalokuttarañāṇaṁ uppajjati, tasmā
anya-e0102n10:114_4: taṁ sabbampi pahātabbaṁ hotīti. Evamettha ye yena pahātabbā dhammā, tesaṁ pahānañca jānitabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:119_0: Saccābhisamayakālaṁ hi etesu catūsu ñāṇesu ekekassa ekakkhaṇe pariññā pahānaṁ sacchikiriyā
anya-e0102n10:119_1: bhāvanāti etāni pariññādīni cattāri kiccāni vuttāni, tāni yathāsabhāvena jānitabbāni.
anya-e0102n10:120_0: “Yathā padīpo apubbaṁ acarimaṁ ekakkhaṇe cattāri kiccāni karoti, vaṭṭiṁ jhāpeti,
anya-e0102n10:120_1: andhakāraṁ vidhamati, ālokaṁ parividaṁseti, sinehaṁ pariyādiyati, evameva maggañāṇaṁ
anya-e0102n10:120_2: apubbaṁ acarimaṁ ekakkhaṇe cattāri saccāni abhisameti, dukkhaṁ pariññābhisamayena
anya-e0102n10:120_3: abhisameti, samudayaṁ pahānābhisamayena abhisameti, maggaṁ bhāvanābhisamayena abhisameti,
anya-e0102n10:120_4: nirodhaṁ sacchikiriyābhisamayena abhisameti. Kiṁ vuttaṁ hoti? Nirodhaṁ ārammaṇaṁ
anya-e0102n10:120_5: karitvā cattāripi saccāni pāpuṇāti passati paṭivijjhatī”ti.
anya-e0102n10:121: Vuttampi cetaṁ “yo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ passati, dukkhasamudayampi so passati, dukkhanirodhampi passati, dukkhanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadampi passatī”ti sabbaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:122: Aparampi vuttaṁ “maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇaṁ, dukkhepetaṁ ñāṇaṁ, dukkhasamudayepetaṁ ñāṇaṁ, dukkhanirodhepetaṁ ñāṇaṁ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāyapetaṁ ñāṇa”nti.
anya-e0102n10:123_0: Tattha yathā padīpo vaṭṭiṁ jhāpeti, evaṁ maggañāṇaṁ dukkhaṁ parijānāti. Yathā andhakāraṁ
anya-e0102n10:123_1: vidhamati, evaṁ samudayaṁ pajahati. Yathā ālokaṁ parividaṁseti, evaṁ sahajātādipaccayatāya
anya-e0102n10:123_2: sammāsaṅkappādidhammasaṅkhātaṁ maggaṁ bhāveti. Yathā sinehaṁ pariyādiyati, evaṁ kilesapariyādānaṁ
anya-e0102n10:124_0: 840. Aparo nayo – yathā sūriyo udayanto apubbaṁ acarimaṁ saha pātubhāvā cattāri kiccāni
anya-e0102n10:124_1: karoti, rūpagatāni obhāseti, andhakāraṁ vidhamati, ālokaṁ dasseti, sītaṁ paṭippassambheti,
anya-e0102n10:124_2: evameva maggañāṇaṁ…pe… nirodhaṁ sacchikiriyābhisamayena abhisameti. Idhāpi yathā
anya-e0102n10:124_3: sūriyo rūpagatāni obhāseti, evaṁ maggañāṇaṁ dukkhaṁ parijānāti. Yathā andhakāraṁ
anya-e0102n10:124_4: vidhamati, evaṁ samudayaṁ pajahati. Yathā ālokaṁ dasseti, evaṁ sahajātādipaccayatāya

anya-e0102n10:125_0: 841. Aparo nayo – yathā nāvā apubbaṁ acarimaṁ ekakkhaṇe cattāri kiccāni karoti, orimatīraṁ
anya-e0102n10:125_1: pajahati, sotaṁ chindati, bhaṇḍaṁ vahati, pārimatīraṁ appeti, evameva maggañāṇaṁ…pe…
anya-e0102n10:125_2: nirodhaṁ sacchikiriyābhisamayena abhisameti. Etthāpi yathā nāvā orimatīraṁ pajahati,
anya-e0102n10:125_3: evaṁ maggañāṇaṁ dukkhaṁ parijānāti. Yathā sotaṁ chindati, evaṁ samudayaṁ pajahati.
anya-e0102n10:125_4: Yathā bhaṇḍaṁ vahati, evaṁ sahajātādipaccayatāya maggaṁ bhāveti. Yathā pārimatīraṁ
anya-e0102n10:125_5: appeti, evaṁ pārimatīrabhūtaṁ nirodhaṁ sacchikarotīti evaṁ upamāsaṁsandanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:126: 842. Evaṁ saccābhisamayakālasmiṁ ekakkhaṇe catunnaṁ kiccānaṁ vasena pavattañāṇassa panassa soḷasahākārehi tathaṭṭhena cattāri kiccāni ekapaṭivedhāni honti. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n10:127_0: “Kathaṁ tathaṭṭhena cattāri kiccāni ekapaṭivedhāni? Soḷasahi ākārehi tathaṭṭhena
anya-e0102n10:127_1: cattāri kiccāni ekapaṭivedhāni. Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho, saṅkhataṭṭho, santāpaṭṭho,
anya-e0102n10:127_2: vipariṇāmaṭṭho, tathaṭṭho. Samudayassa āyūhanaṭṭho, nidānaṭṭho, saṁyogaṭṭho, palibodhaṭṭho,
anya-e0102n10:127_3: tathaṭṭho. Nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho, vivekaṭṭho, asaṅkhataṭṭho, amataṭṭho, tathaṭṭho.
anya-e0102n10:127_4: Maggassa niyyānaṭṭho, hetuṭṭho, dassanaṭṭho, adhipateyyaṭṭho, tathaṭṭho. Imehi soḷasahi
anya-e0102n10:127_5: ākārehi tathaṭṭhena cattāri saccāni ekasaṅgahitāni. Yaṁ ekasaṅgahitaṁ, taṁ ekattaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:127_6: Yaṁ ekattaṁ, taṁ ekena ñāṇena paṭivijjhatīti cattāri saccāni ekapaṭivedhānī”ti.
anya-e0102n10:128_0: 843. Tattha siyā yadā dukkhādīnaṁ aññepi rogagaṇḍādayo atthā atthi, atha kasmā cattāroyeva
anya-e0102n10:128_1: vuttāti. Ettha vadāma, aññasaccadassanavasena āvibhāvato. “Tattha katamaṁ dukkhe
anya-e0102n10:128_2: ñāṇaṁ? Dukkhaṁ ārabbha yā uppajjati paññā pajānanā”tiādinā hi nayena ekekasaccārammaṇavasenāpi
anya-e0102n10:128_3: saccañāṇaṁ vuttaṁ. “Yo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ passati, samudayampi so passatī”tiādinā
anya-e0102n10:128_4: nayena ekaṁ saccaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā sesesupi kiccanipphattivasenāpi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:129_0: Tattha yadā ekekaṁ saccaṁ ārammaṇaṁ karoti, tadā samudayadassanena tāva sabhāvato
anya-e0102n10:129_1: pīḷanalakkhaṇassāpi dukkhassa, yasmā taṁ āyūhanalakkhaṇena samudayena āyūhitaṁ saṅkhataṁ
anya-e0102n10:129_2: rāsikataṁ, tasmāssa so saṅkhataṭṭho āvibhavati. Yasmā pana maggo kilesasantāpaharo
anya-e0102n10:129_3: susītalo, tasmāssa maggassa dassanena santāpaṭṭho āvibhavati āyasmato nandassa accharādassanena
anya-e0102n10:129_4: sundariyā anabhirūpabhāvo viya. Avipariṇāmadhammassa pana nirodhassa dassanenassa
anya-e0102n10:130_0: Tathā sabhāvato āyūhanalakkhaṇassāpi samudayassa, dukkhadassanena nidānaṭṭho āvibhavati
anya-e0102n10:130_1: asappāyabhojanato uppannabyādhidassanena bhojanassa byādhinidānabhāvo viya. Visaṁyogabhūtassa
anya-e0102n10:130_2: nirodhassa dassanena saṁyogaṭṭho. Niyyānabhūtassa ca maggassa dassanena palibodhaṭṭhoti.
anya-e0102n10:131_0: Tathā nissaraṇalakkhaṇassāpi nirodhassa, avivekabhūtassa samudayassa dassanena vivekaṭṭho
anya-e0102n10:131_1: āvibhavati. Maggadassanena asaṅkhataṭṭho, iminā hi anamataggasaṁsāre maggo nadiṭṭhapubbo,
anya-e0102n10:131_2: sopi ca sappaccayattā saṅkhatoyevāti appaccayadhammassa asaṅkhatabhāvo ativiya pākaṭo
anya-e0102n10:131_3: hoti. Dukkhadassanena panassa amataṭṭho āvibhavati, dukkhaṁ hi visaṁ, amataṁ nibbānanti.
anya-e0102n10:132_0: Tathā niyyānalakkhaṇassāpi maggassa, samudayadassanena “nāyaṁ hetu nibbānassa pattiyā,
anya-e0102n10:132_1: ayaṁ hetū”ti hetuṭṭho āvibhavati. Nirodhadassanena dassanaṭṭho, paramasukhumāni rūpāni
anya-e0102n10:132_2: passato “vippasannaṁ vata me cakkhū”nti cakkhussa vippasannabhāvo viya. Dukkhadassanena
anya-e0102n10:132_4: evamettha salakkhaṇavasena ekekassa, aññasaccadassanavasena ca itaresaṁ tiṇṇaṁ tiṇṇaṁ
anya-e0102n10:132_5: āvibhāvato ekekassa cattāro cattāro atthā vuttā. Maggakkhaṇe pana sabbe cete atthā
anya-e0102n10:132_6: ekeneva dukkhādīsu catukiccena ñāṇena paṭivedhaṁ gacchantīti. Ye pana nānābhisamayaṁ
anya-e0102n10:132_7: icchanti, tesaṁ uttaraṁ abhidhamme kathāvatthusmiṁ vuttameva.
anya-e0102n10:134: 844. Idāni yāni tāni pariññādīni cattāri kiccāni vuttāni, tesu –
anya-e0102n10:135: Tividhā hoti pariññā, tathā pahānampi sacchikiriyāpi;
anya-e0102n10:136: Dve bhāvanā abhimatā, vinicchayo tattha ñātabbo.
anya-e0102n10:137_0: 845.Tividhā hoti pariññāti ñātapariññā tīraṇapariññā pahānapariññāti evaṁ pariññā
anya-e0102n10:137_1: tividhā hoti. Tattha “abhiññāpaññā ñātaṭṭhena ñāṇa”nti evaṁ uddisitvā “ye ye dhammā
anya-e0102n10:137_2: abhiññātā honti, te te dhammā ñātā hontī”ti evaṁ saṅkhepato, “sabbaṁ, bhikkhave,
anya-e0102n10:137_3: abhiññeyyaṁ. Kiñca, bhikkhave, sabbaṁ abhiññeyyaṁ? Cakkhuṁ, bhikkhave, abhiññeyya”ntiādinā
anya-e0102n10:137_4: nayena vitthārato vuttā ñātapariññā nāma. Tassā sappaccayanāmarūpābhijānanā āveṇikā bhūmi.
anya-e0102n10:138_0: 846. “Pariññāpaññā tīraṇaṭṭhena ñāṇa”nti evaṁ uddisitvā pana “ye ye dhammā pariññātā
anya-e0102n10:138_1: honti, te te dhammā tīritā hontī”ti evaṁ saṅkhepato, “sabbaṁ, bhikkhave, pariññeyyaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:138_2: Kiñca, bhikkhave, sabbaṁ pariññeyyaṁ? Cakkhuṁ, bhikkhave, pariññeyya”ntiādinā nayena
anya-e0102n10:138_3: vitthārato vuttā tīraṇapariññā nāma. Tassā kalāpasammasanato paṭṭhāya aniccaṁ dukkhamanattāti
anya-e0102n10:138_4: tīraṇavasena pavattamānāya yāva anulomā āveṇikā bhūmi.
anya-e0102n10:139_0: 847. “Pahānapaññā pariccāgaṭṭhena ñāṇa”nti evaṁ pana uddisitvā “ye ye dhammā pahīnā
anya-e0102n10:139_1: honti, te te dhammā pariccattā hontī”ti evaṁ vitthārato vuttā “aniccānupassanāya
anya-e0102n10:139_2: niccasaññaṁ pajahatī”tiādinayappavattā pahānapariññā. Tassā bhaṅgānupassanato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0102n10:139_3: yāva maggañāṇā bhūmi, ayaṁ idha adhippetā.
anya-e0102n10:140_0: Yasmā vā ñātatīraṇapariññāyopi tadatthāyeva, yasmā ca ye dhamme pajahati, te niyamato
anya-e0102n10:140_1: ñātā ceva tīritā ca honti, tasmā pariññāttayampi iminā pariyāyena maggañāṇassa kiccanti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:141_0: 848.Tathā pahānampīti pahānampi hi vikkhambhanappahānaṁ tadaṅgappahānaṁ samucchedappahānanti
anya-e0102n10:141_1: pariññā viya tividhameva hoti. Tattha yaṁ sasevāle udake pakkhittena ghaṭena sevālassa
anya-e0102n10:141_2: viya tena tena lokiyasamādhinā nīvaraṇādīnaṁ paccanīkadhammānaṁ vikkhambhanaṁ, idaṁ
anya-e0102n10:141_3: vikkhambhanappahānaṁ nāma. Pāḷiyaṁ pana “vikkhambhanappahānañca nīvaraṇānaṁ paṭhamaṁ
anya-e0102n10:141_4: jhānaṁ bhāvayato”ti nīvaraṇānaññeva vikkhambhanaṁ vuttaṁ, taṁ pākaṭattā vuttanti
anya-e0102n10:141_5: veditabbaṁ. Nīvaraṇāni hi jhānassa pubbabhāgepi pacchābhāgepi na sahasā cittaṁ ajjhottharanti,
anya-e0102n10:141_6: vitakkādayo appitakkhaṇeyeva. Tasmā nīvaraṇānaṁ vikkhambhanaṁ pākaṭaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:142_0: 849. Yaṁ pana rattibhāge samujjalitena padīpena andhakārassa viya tena tena vipassanāya
anya-e0102n10:142_1: avayavabhūtena ñāṇaṅgena paṭipakkhavaseneva tassa tassa pahātabbadhammassa pahānaṁ,
anya-e0102n10:142_2: idaṁ tadaṅgappahānaṁ nāma. Seyyathidaṁ – nāmarūpaparicchedena tāva sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā.
anya-e0102n10:142_3: Paccayapariggahena ahetuvisamahetudiṭṭhiyā ceva kaṅkhāmalassa ca. Kalāpasammasanena
anya-e0102n10:142_4: “ahaṁ mamā”ti samūhagāhassa. Maggāmaggavavatthānena amagge maggasaññāya. Udayadassanena
anya-e0102n10:142_5: ucchedadiṭṭhiyā. Vayadassanena sassatadiṭṭhiyā. Bhayatupaṭṭhānena sabhaye abhayasaññāya.
anya-e0102n10:143_0: Yaṁ vā pana aṭṭhārasasu mahāvipassanāsu aniccānupassanāya niccasaññāya. Dukkhānupassanāya
anya-e0102n10:143_1: sukhasaññāya. Anattānupassanāya attasaññāya. Nibbidānupassanāya nandiyā. Virāgānupassanāya
anya-e0102n10:143_2: rāgassa. Nirodhānupassanāya samudayassa. Paṭinissaggānupassanāya ādānassa. Khayānupassanāya
anya-e0102n10:143_3: ghanasaññāya. Vayānupassanāya āyūhanassa. Vipariṇāmānupassanāya dhuvasaññāya. Animittānupassanāya
anya-e0102n10:143_4: nimittassa. Appaṇihitānupassanāya paṇidhiyā. Suññatānupassanāya abhinivesassa. Adhipaññādhammavipassanāya
anya-e0102n10:144: 850. Tattha yathā aniccānupassanādīhi sattahi niccasaññādīnaṁ pahānaṁ hoti, taṁ bhaṅgānupassane vuttameva.
anya-e0102n10:145: Khayānupassanāti pana ghanavinibbhogaṁ katvā aniccaṁ khayaṭṭhenāti evaṁ khayaṁ passato ñāṇaṁ. Tena ghanasaññāya pahānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n10:149_0: Evaṁ vuttā paccakkhato ceva anvayato ca saṅkhārānaṁ bhaṅgaṁ disvā tasmiññeva bhaṅgasaṅkhāte
anya-e0102n10:149_1: nirodhe adhimuttatā, tāya āyūhanassa pahānaṁ hoti. Yesaṁ hi atthāya āyūheyya, “te
anya-e0102n10:149_2: evaṁ vayadhammā”ti vipassato āyūhane cittaṁ na namati.
anya-e0102n10:150_0: Vipariṇāmānupassanāti rūpasattakādivasena taṁ taṁ paricchedaṁ atikkamma aññathāpavattidassanaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:150_1: Uppannassa vā jarāya ceva maraṇena ca dvīhākārehi vipariṇāmadassanaṁ, tāya dhuvasaññāya pahānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n10:151: Animittānupassanāti aniccānupassanāva, tāya niccanimittassa pahānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n10:153: Suññatānupassanāti anattānupassanāva, tāya “atthi attā”ti abhinivesassa pahānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n10:157_0: Evaṁ vuttā rūpādiārammaṇaṁ jānitvā tassa ca ārammaṇassa tadārammaṇassa ca cittassa
anya-e0102n10:157_1: bhaṅgaṁ disvā “saṅkhārāva bhijjanti, saṅkhārānaṁ maraṇaṁ, na añño koci atthī”ti bhaṅgavasena
anya-e0102n10:157_2: suññataṁ gahetvā pavattā vipassanā. Sā adhipaññā ca dhammesu ca vipassanāti katvā
anya-e0102n10:157_3: adhipaññādhammavipassanāti vuccati, tāya niccasārābhāvassa ca attasārābhāvassa ca
anya-e0102n10:158_0: Yathābhūtañāṇadassananti sappaccayanāmarūpapariggaho, tena “ahosiṁ nu kho ahaṁ atītamaddhāna”ntiādivasena
anya-e0102n10:158_1: ceva, “issarato loko sambhotī”tiādivasena ca pavattassa sammohābhinivesassa pahānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n10:159: Ādīnavānupassanāti bhayatupaṭṭhānavasena uppannaṁ sabbabhavādīsu ādīnavadassanañāṇaṁ, tena “kiñci allīyitabbaṁ na dissatī”ti ālayābhinivesassa pahānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n10:160: Paṭisaṅkhānupassanāti muñcanassa upāyakaraṇaṁ paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṁ, tena appaṭisaṅkhāya pahānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n10:161_0: Vivaṭṭānupassanāti saṅkhārupekkhā ceva anulomañca. Tadā hissa cittaṁ īsakapoṇe padumapalāse
anya-e0102n10:161_1: udakabindu viya sabbasmā saṅkhāragatā patilīyati, patikuṭati, pativattatīti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:161_2: Tasmā tāya saṁyogābhinivesassa pahānaṁ hoti, kāmasaṁyogādikassa kilesābhinivesassa
anya-e0102n10:161_3: kilesappavattiyā pahānaṁ hotīti attho. Evaṁ vitthārato tadaṅgappahānaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:161_4: Pāḷiyaṁ pana “tadaṅgappahānañca diṭṭhigatānaṁ nibbedhabhāgiyaṁ samādhiṁ bhāvayato”ti
anya-e0102n10:162_0: 851. Yaṁ pana asanivicakkābhihatassa rukkhassa viya ariyamaggañāṇena saṁyojanādīnaṁ
anya-e0102n10:162_1: dhammānaṁ yathā na puna pavatti, evaṁ pahānaṁ, idaṁ samucchedappahānaṁ nāma. Yaṁ
anya-e0102n10:162_2: sandhāya vuttaṁ “samucchedappahānañca lokuttaraṁ khayagāmimaggaṁ bhāvayato”ti. Iti
anya-e0102n10:162_3: imesu tīsu pahānesu samucchedappahānameva idha adhippetaṁ. Yasmā pana tassa yogino
anya-e0102n10:162_4: pubbabhāge vikkhambhanatadaṅgappahānānipi tadatthāneva, tasmā pahānattayampi iminā
anya-e0102n10:162_5: pariyāyena maggañāṇassa kiccanti veditabbaṁ. Paṭirājānaṁ vadhitvā rajjaṁ pattena
anya-e0102n10:162_6: hi yampi tato pubbe kataṁ, sabbaṁ “idañcidañca raññā kata”ntiyeva vuccati.
anya-e0102n10:163_1: dassanabhāvanāvasena bhedato tividhā hoti. Tattha “paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhīmhi,
anya-e0102n10:163_2: vasīmhi, paṭhamajjhānaṁ sacchikataṁ mayā”tiādinā nayena āgatā paṭhamajjhānādīnaṁ
anya-e0102n10:163_3: phassanā lokiyasacchikiriyā nāma. Phassanāti adhigantvā “idaṁ mayā adhigata”nti paccakkhato
anya-e0102n10:163_4: ñāṇaphassena phusanā. Imameva hi atthaṁ sandhāya “sacchikiriyā paññā phassanaṭṭhe
anya-e0102n10:163_5: ñāṇa”nti uddisitvā “ye ye dhammā sacchikatā honti, te te dhammā phassitā hontī”ti
anya-e0102n10:164_0: Apica attano santāne anuppādetvāpi ye dhammā kevalaṁ aparappaccayena ñāṇena ñātā,
anya-e0102n10:164_1: te sacchikatā honti. Teneva hi “sabbaṁ, bhikkhave, sacchikātabbaṁ. Kiñca, bhikkhave,
anya-e0102n10:164_2: sabbaṁ sacchikātabbaṁ? Cakkhu, bhikkhave, sacchikātabba”ntiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:165_0: Aparampi vuttaṁ “rūpaṁ passanto sacchikaroti. Vedanaṁ…pe… viññāṇaṁ passanto sacchikaroti.
anya-e0102n10:165_1: Cakkhuṁ…pe… jarāmaraṇaṁ…pe… amatogadhaṁ nibbānaṁ passanto sacchikarotīti. Ye ye dhammā
anya-e0102n10:165_2: sacchikatā honti, te te dhammā phassitā hontī”ti.
anya-e0102n10:166_0: Paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe pana nibbānadassanaṁ dassanasacchikiriyā. Sesamaggakkhaṇesu bhāvanāsacchikiriyāti.
anya-e0102n10:166_1: Sā duvidhāpi idha adhippetā. Tasmā dassanabhāvanāvasena nibbānassa sacchikiriyā imassa
anya-e0102n10:167_0: 853.Dvebhāvanā abhimatāti bhāvanā pana lokiyabhāvanā lokuttarabhāvanāti dveyeva abhimatā.
anya-e0102n10:167_1: Tattha lokiyānaṁ sīlasamādhipaññānaṁ uppādanaṁ, tāhi ca santānavāsanaṁ lokiyabhāvanā.
anya-e0102n10:167_2: Lokuttarānaṁ uppādanaṁ, tāhi ca santānavāsanaṁ lokuttarabhāvanā. Tāsu idha lokuttarā
anya-e0102n10:167_3: adhippetā. Lokuttarāni hi sīlādīni catubbidhampetaṁ ñāṇaṁ uppādeti. Tesaṁ sahajātapaccayāditāya
anya-e0102n10:167_4: tehi ca santānaṁ vāsetīti lokuttarabhāvanāvassa kiccanti.
anya-e0102n10:172: “Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṁ paññañca bhāvaya”nti. –
anya-e0102n10:173_0: Evaṁ sarūpeneva ābhatāya paññābhāvanāya vidhānadassanatthaṁ yaṁ vuttaṁ “mūlabhūtā
anya-e0102n10:173_1: dve visuddhiyo sampādetvā sarīrabhūtā pañca visuddhiyo sampādentena bhāvetabbā”ti,
anya-e0102n10:173_2: taṁ vitthāritaṁ hoti. Kathaṁ bhāvetabbāti ayañca pañho vissajjitoti.
